channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title:
视频：🇺🇦 追踪乌克兰两年来的战争情况
近 24 个月的战争造成了巨大的人员伤亡，乌克兰军队寡不敌众，俄罗斯军队再次发动进攻
📹AFPTV、乌克兰国家紧急事务局、乌克兰总统府 📷 @RomanPilipey #AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇺🇦 Tracking two years of war in Ukraine

After nearly 24 months leaving a huge human cost, Ukraine's troops are outnumbered and Russian forces are once again on the offensive

📹 AFPTV, STATE EMERGENCY SERVICE OF UKRAINE, UKRAINIAN PRESIDENCY
📷 @RomanPilipey
#AFPVertical

item.title: R to @AFP：#俄罗斯反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼（Alexei Navalny）的丈夫去世后，社交媒体网站 X 周二短暂封锁了尤利娅-纳瓦尔娜娅（Yulia Navalnaya）的账户，而她创建该账户仅一天之后，➡️。
item.description: #UPDATE The social media site X on Tuesday briefly blocked the account of Yulia Navalnaya, just one day after she created it following the death of her husband, Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny ➡️ u.afp.com/5N2S

item.title:
视频：🇺🇦🇷🇺 俄罗斯声称 "完全控制 "乌克兰阿夫迪耶夫卡市
上周，在克里姆林宫入侵乌克兰两周年之前，俄罗斯加强了攻势，莫斯科军队占领了这座乌克兰东部的重要城市。
📹 TELEGRAM /@nm_dnr, @FL0_orent #AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇺🇦🇷🇺 Russia claims 'full control' of Ukraine's Avdiivka

A heightened Russian offensive saw Moscow's forces capture the key eastern Ukrainian city last week ahead of the second anniversary of the Kremlin's invasion.

📹 TELEGRAM /@nm_dnr, @FL0_orent
#AFPVertical

item.title:
视频： 🇬🇧 英国法院听取阿桑奇反对引渡到美国的最后上诉
维基解密创始人朱利安-阿桑奇（Julian Assange）的支持者在伦敦法院外集会，法院正在审理他的最后一次上诉。
📹 @JustineGerardy, @Laure_vr 📷 @JustinTallis #AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇬🇧 UK court hears final Assange appeal against extradition to US

Supporters of WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange rally outside the London court hearing his final appeal, from which he was absent due to illness.

📹 @JustineGerardy, @Laure_vr
📷 @JustinTallis
#AFPVertical

item.title: RT by @AFP：苏丹难民在人满为患的南苏丹难民营中苦苦等待。 📸@luistatophoto #AFP
item.description:
Sudanese refugees face gruelling wait in overcrowded South Sudan camps.
📸@luistatophoto #AFP

item.title: R to @AFP：#瑞典首相乌尔夫-克里斯特松（Ulf Kristersson）将于周五会见匈牙利首相维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban），距离瑞典加入北约的关键议会投票还有三天，瑞典官员周二表示 ➡️
item.description: #UPDATE Swedish Prime Minister Ulf Kristersson will meet Hungarian counterpart Viktor Orban on Friday, three days ahead of a key parliamentary vote on Sweden's bid to join NATO, officials said on Tuesday ➡️ u.afp.com/5NB5

item.title: R to @AFP：#社交网站 X 重新激活了尤利娅-纳瓦尔娜娅的账户
item.description: #BREAKING Social media site X reactivates Yulia Navalnaya's account

item.title: 安德烈亚斯-布雷姆（Andreas Brehme）在 1990 年世界杯决赛中为西德队在第 85 分钟点球大战中战胜阿根廷队，他的前俱乐部拜仁慕尼黑表示，安德烈亚斯-布雷姆已经去世，享年 63 岁 ⬇️ #AFPSports
item.description: Andreas Brehme, whose 85th-minute penalty sealed victory for West Germany over Argentina in the 1990 World Cup final, has died at the age of 63, his former club Bayern Munich said ⬇️ u.afp.com/5NXv #AFPSports

item.title: R to @AFP：#社交媒体网站 X 在尤利娅-纳瓦尔纳亚创建账户的第二天就 "暂停 "了她的账户。
item.description: #BREAKING Social media site X says 'suspended' Yulia Navalnaya's account, day after she created it

item.title: 莫斯科一家法院周二表示，被监禁的美国记者埃文-格什科维奇（Evan Gershkovich）将被审前拘留至少至 3 月 30 日，这将确保他在俄罗斯监狱度过至少一年的牢狱生活。
item.description:
A Moscow court on Tuesday said jailed US journalist Evan Gershkovich would remain in pre-trial detention until at least March 30, ensuring he will spend at least a year behind bars in a Russian jail.
tinyurl.com/yd2k3vch

item.title: 视频：人造宝石正在重塑价值 890 亿美元的全球钻石珠宝市场，尤其是在印度西部城市苏拉特，全球 90% 的钻石都是在这里切割和抛光的。
item.description: VIDEO: Man-made gems are reshaping the $89 billion global diamond jewellery market, especially in the west Indian city of Surat where 90 percent of the world's diamonds are cut and polished.

item.title: R to @AFP：#最新消息 英国国家犯罪署周二表示，在与国际合作伙伴针对勒索软件专家 LockBit 开展的行动中，该机构捣毁了 "世界上危害最大的网络犯罪团伙"。
item.description: #UPDATE Britain's National Crime Agency on Tuesday said it had disrupted "the world's most harmful cyber crime group" in an operation with international partners targeting ransomware specialist LockBit.

item.title: R to @AFP：#瑞典首相乌尔夫-克里斯特松（Ulf Kristersson）将于周五会见匈牙利首相维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban），在此之前，布达佩斯议会将就瑞典陷入僵局的加入北约申请进行关键投票。
item.description: #UPDATE Swedish Prime Minister Ulf Kristersson will meet Hungarian counterpart Viktor Orban on Friday ahead of a key parliamentary vote in Budapest on Sweden's stalled bid to join NATO.

item.title: #国际犯罪执法人员捣毁 "危害最大的网络犯罪团伙
item.description: #BREAKING International crime enforcers disrupt 'most harmful cyber crime group'

item.title: #瑞典首相将在匈牙利就申办北约进行关键投票前会见欧尔班
item.description: #BREAKING Swedish PM to meet Orban ahead of key Hungary vote on NATO bid

item.title: 视频：海洋生物学家在南极洲采集座头鲸和豹斑海豹的皮肤样本，检测它们体内是否含有汞。
item.description: VIDEO: Marine biologists collect skin samples from humpback whales and leopard seals in Antarctica to detect the presence of mercury in their bodies.

item.title: R to @AFP：视频：数十人在伦敦高等法院外抗议，朱利安-阿桑奇（Julian Assange）在英国提出的反对引渡到美国的最后上诉听证会即将在此开庭。
item.description: VIDEO: Dozens of people protest outside the London High Court where a hearing for Julian Assange's final UK appeal against extradition to the United States is set to begin.

item.title: 在英国，坑洼日益成为一种祸患和困扰。据车辆故障公司 RAC 称，由于人们普遍认为政府缺乏用于长期维修的投资，坑洞数量已超过 100 万个。
item.description:
In Britain, potholes are increasingly a scourge and an obsession. Potholes are thought to number more than one million, according to vehicle-breakdown company RAC, owing to a widely-perceived lack of government investment for long-lasting repairs.
u.afp.com/5NhL

item.title: 周二，伦敦高等法院将开始审理维基解密创始人朱利安-阿桑奇（Julian Assange）的最后一次英国上诉，他不服被引渡到美国接受审判，因为他公布了秘密军事和外交文件。
item.description:
The High Court in London Tuesday will begin hearing WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange's final UK appeal against extradition to the United States to face trial over publishing secret military and diplomatic files.
tinyurl.com/5ey8v54a

item.title: 视频：数百名裸体男子为争夺一袋木制护身符而大打出手，为日本一个有着千年历史的仪式画上了戏剧性的句号。相扑 "节受到了日本人口老龄化危机的影响。
item.description: VIDEO: Hundreds of naked men tussle over a bag of wooden talismans, performing a dramatic end to a thousand-year-old ritual in Japan that took place for the last time. The "Sominsai" festival is impacted by the country's ageing population crisis.

item.title: R to @AFP：#最新消息 被监禁的俄罗斯反对派政治家伊利亚-雅辛（Ilya Yashin）在得知他的朋友和同事、克里姆林宫批评家阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼（Alexei Navalny）死于狱中后，于周二发誓要继续为俄罗斯的民主而战。
item.description:
#UPDATE Jailed Russian opposition politician Ilya Yashin vowed on Tuesday to continue fighting for democracy in Russia after learning his friend and colleague, Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny, had died in prison.
u.afp.com/5Nha

item.title: 委内瑞拉总统尼古拉-马杜罗誓言禁止美国石油巨头埃克森美孚公司进入埃塞奎博石油富集区附近的水域，加拉加斯声称圭亚那将该地区据为己有。
item.description:
Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro has vowed to bar US petroleum giant ExxonMobil from the waters off the oil-rich region of Essequibo, which Caracas claims from Guyana as its own.
u.afp.com/5Nhu

item.title: R to @AFP：#最新消息：瑞典周二表示，它将向乌克兰提供价值 71 亿克朗（6.82 亿美元）的军事装备，这对正在努力抵御俄罗斯入侵的乌克兰来说是一个鼓舞。
item.description:
#UPDATE Sweden said Tuesday it would give 7.1 billion kronor ($682 million) worth of military equipment to Ukraine, in a boost for the country as it struggles to fight off Russia's invasion.
u.afp.com/5Nhb

item.title: 一名工会代表告诉法新社，世界顶级旅游景点之一的埃菲尔铁塔将在周二连续第二天关闭，因为工作人员延长了罢工时间。
item.description:
The Eiffel Tower, one of the world's top tourist attractions, will remain closed for a second straight day Tuesday as staff extend a strike, a union representative told AFP.
u.afp.com/5NhB

item.title: 视频：阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼（Alexei Navalny）的遗孀尤利娅-纳瓦尔娜亚（Yulia Navalnaya）指控弗拉基米尔-普京总统杀害了她的丈夫，并承诺将 "点名道姓 "地揭露那些她声称对纳瓦尔尼的死负有责任的人。
item.description: VIDEO: Alexei Navalny's widow Yulia Navalnaya accuses President Vladimir Putin of killing her husband and promises to "name names and show faces" of those she claims are responsible for his death, three days after Navalny died in an Arctic prison.

item.title:
荷兰风力发电船驶向更加绿色的未来。
世界上第一艘装有巨型硬铝 "风帆 "的化学品油轮已驶离鹿特丹，其船东希望为减少航运业的巨大碳足迹开辟一条道路
item.description:
Wind-powered Dutch ship sets sail for greener future.

The world's first chemical tanker ship fitted with massive rigid aluminium "sails" has left Rotterdam, its owner hoping to plot a route to bringing down the shipping industry's huge carbon footprint

u.afp.com/5NnC

item.title:
实验室培育的钻石给天然宝石带来了压力。
闪闪发光的钻石闪烁着同样的光芒，但也有关键的区别：开采出来的天然宝石已有十多亿年的历史，而实验室制造的宝石则是新的，价格还不到天然宝石的一半。
item.description:
Lab-grown diamonds put natural gems under pressure.

The glittering diamonds sparkle the same but there are key differences: mined natural gems are more than a billion years old, while laboratory-made rocks are new and cost less than half the price

u.afp.com/5NnH

item.title:
R to @AFP：未来十年，澳大利亚计划将其战舰舰队扩大一倍，并将国防开支再增加 70 亿美元。
其中包括六艘猎人级护卫舰、三艘空战驱逐舰和六艘最先进的水面战舰。
item.description:
Over the next decade Australia plans to double its fleet of warships and boost defence spending by an additional US$7 billion.

Among the new ships will be six Hunter class frigates, three air warfare destroyers and six state-of-the-art surface warships

u.afp.com/5Nnx

item.title:
R to @AFP：#在得知他的朋友和同事、克里姆林宫批评家阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼（Alexei Navalny）死于狱中后，被监禁的俄罗斯反对派政治家伊利亚-雅辛（Ilya Yashin）周二发誓要继续为俄罗斯的自由而战。
"只要我的心脏还在跳动，我就会与暴政作斗争。只要我还活着，我就不怕任何邪恶，"雅辛在社交媒体上发帖说，他承认自己的生命 "掌握在普京手中，而且正处于危险之中"。
item.description:
#UPDATE Jailed Russian opposition politician Ilya Yashin on Tuesday vowed to continue fighting for Russia's freedom after learning that his friend and colleague, Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny, had died in prison.

"As long as my heart beats in my chest, I will fight tyranny. As long as I live, I will fear no evil," Yashin said in a post on social media, acknowledging that his own life "is in Putin's hands and it's in danger"

item.title: R to @AFP：视频： 中国首架国产客机 C919 在亚洲最大的航空盛会新加坡航展上首次国际亮相
item.description: VIDEO: China's first domestically produced passenger jet C919 makes its international debut at the Singapore Airshow, the largest aviation event in Asia
